title: [LOVE] Ep. 52: How To Set Boundaries In Your Love Life w/ Bryan Reeves
description:
Are you holding on to what isn’t good for you?

This week, Ash gets a different perspective on relationships from Bryan Reeves, a life and relationship coach who specializes in helping people connect to themselves and intimacy wholely.  Listen in to understand 4 reasons why you might not be setting healthy boundaries in your relationships, and how to overcome this.  It is no surprise that men and women handle emotions differently, learn why that may be and how to best support your partner in the future.  And it wouldn’t be a conversation about relationships without discussing red flags!  Ash and Bryan go over what some may be, and the different ways to recognize them.  Don’t forget to stick around for Ashley’s post-episode notes!

Resources:

www.bryanreeves.com

 

Ready to land the job you love? Visit YouTurnPodcast.com/joboffer
